Package vialab.SMT.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveDisplayTouchBinder
    A class that maps touch coordinates onto the display that the current sketch is on.
    DisplayTouchBinder
    A class that maps touch coordinates onto the specified display.
    ProxyTuioListener
    This class exists to insert the port number of connections into session id of tuio cursors and objects .
    RectTouchBinder
    A class that maps touch coordinates on a rectangle
    ScreenTouchBinder
    Just a little class for describing how to map ([0,1], [0,1]) tuio coordinates to ([0,applet.width], [0,applet.height]) touch coordinates.
    SketchTouchBinder
    A class that maps touch coordinates the current sketch's dimensions.
    SystemAdapter
    A utility class for getting system and processing info.
    TouchBinder
    Just a little class for describing how to map ([0,1], [0,1]) tuio coordinates onto ([0,applet.width], [0,applet.height]) touch coordinates.
    ZonePicker
    A little utility class for mapping the pixel coordinates of touches to zones.
